extendedInfo.description: Tired of being stuck in a restaurant, trying to decide what to order? Sick of trying to choose between dating John or Adam? Can't make up your mind about what kid you love the most? Let Choose For Me! decide for you! Choose For Me! is your decision maker for life! Any decision, anytime, anywhere let Choose For Me! make your life easier.Choose For Me!, making the world more decisive one user at a time.Pick the number of options, between 2 or 6. Note: A netter interface with more choice spots coming soon! Enter your choices and click the "Choose For Me!" button.
